name: vls
description: Adds language support for VDF to Visual Studio Code.

scripts.build-deps-osx: del-cli resources/server && cd src/server/VDFServer/VDFServer && dotnet publish --configuration Release --runtime osx-x64 --self-contained --output "../../../../resources/server"
scripts.build-deps-win: del-cli resources/server && cd src/server/VDFServer/VDFServer && dotnet publish --configuration Release --runtime win-x64 --self-contained --output "../../../../resources/server"
scripts.build-osx: npm run build-deps-osx && npm run build-ext
scripts.build-win: npm run build-deps-win && npm run build-ext
scripts.package-osx: npm run build-osx && npm install -g vsce && vsce package
scripts.package-win: npm run build-win && npm install -g vsce && vsce package
